body.p: This project is based on a subset of the CDLI corpus of Proto-Cuneiform texts from the Uruk IV and III periods and was created to support the development of a new iteration of the proposal to encode Proto-Cuneiform in Unicode.
The corpus is restricted mainly to the published portion of the corpus--see for more about the selection process..
The repertoire is available here and can be considered near-final. There are several pages about how decisions were made on what should and should not be encoded.
There is a text corpus; the signlist has not yet been enable for the corpus, but that is planned for the near future.
